DOC.brief_summary: This study compare test performance characteristic visual inspection acetic acid ( VIA ) , Xpert HPV , OncoE6 HIV-infected woman , inform possible inclusion molecular test future cervical cancer screen
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Cervical Cancer Screening Tests HIV-infected Women Lusaka , Zambia
DOC.detailed_description: This cross-sectional study take place cervical cancer prevention clinic Lusaka , Zambia determine test performance characteristic ( sensitivity , specificity , positive predictive value , negative predictive value ) ( 1 ) visual inspection acetic acid , ( 2 ) Xpert HPV , ( 3 ) OncoE6 detection CIN2+ among HIV-infected woman . All cervical screening test evaluate gold standard histopathology obtain cervical biopsy .
DOC.criteria: Women 18 year old . Women document HIVinfection medical record onsite test voluntary counseling test . Women willing undergo pelvic examination cervical cancer screen . Women willing provide write , informed consent . Pregnancy
